text: Joan Dougherty (March 2, 1927 â€“ December 18, 2020) was a Canadian politician. He was born in Montreal. He represented Jacques-Cartier in the National Assembly of Quebec from 1981 to 1987. Dougherty was born in Montreal, Quebec. Dougherty died on December 18, 2020 in Montreal from COVID-19 at the age of 93.Joan Dougherty, former MNA and advocate for public education, dies at 93 ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Montreal Category:Politicians from Montreal
